dares: Dance like a chicken for one minute.
Post an embarrassing photo of yourself online.
Send a silly text to your crush.
Try to lick your elbow.
Talk in a funny accent for the next 10 minutes.
Do 20 pushups.
Sing a song out loud in public.
Eat a spoonful of mustard.
Let someone draw on your face with a marker.
Do an impression of a celebrity until someone guesses who you are.
Call a random number and sing Happy Birthday.
Act like a monkey until your next turn.
Wear socks on your hands until the game ends.
Try to juggle three objects of someoneâ€™s choice.
Do your best chicken dance outside on the street.
Speak only in rhymes for the next three rounds.
Balance a spoon on your nose for 10 seconds.
Do 10 jumping jacks in slow motion.
Pretend to be a waiter/waitress and take snack orders.
Put ice cubes in your socks and wear them for five minutes.
Do an impression of a cartoon character until someone guesses.
Say the alphabet backward as fast as you can.
Let someone tickle you for 30 seconds without laughing.
Post a status update using only emojis.
Pretend to be someone in the room and have others guess who.
Hop on one foot for the next three turns.
Act like a superhero until your next turn.
Hold a funny face for one minute.
Eat a raw onion slice.
Wear a silly hat for the rest of the game.
Take a selfie making the ugliest face possible.
Sing everything you say for the next 10 minutes.
Do a handstand or attempt one.
Pretend to be a robot for the next five minutes.
Let someone redo your hairstyle.
Take a drink of water and try to gargle a song.
Pretend to be a dog and bark at everyone.
Run around the house singing a song.
Do a dance to a song chosen by the group.
Let someone blindfold you for the next two turns.
Talk like a pirate for the rest of the game.
Spin around 10 times and try to walk straight.
Let someone give you a temporary tattoo with a marker.
Balance a book on your head for 10 minutes.
Do your best celebrity impression.
Take a bite out of a lemon.
Wear your shirt backward for the next hour.
Do your best runway model walk.
